summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 7, Lake Union Addition, being the alley between Woodlawn Avenue and Densmore Avenue, from North 43rd Street to North 44th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 102212 to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
